channel.title: Ukraine on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in Ukraine on Rusland 1

item.title: OPERATION WAR
item.description: Speech Putin gave a speech (see also here and here) and, one assumes, believed in a quick victory. It turned into a disaster for everyone, and over two years later, the likelihood of terrible escalation seems more realistic than that of a quick end.

item.title: Луна (Luna) 3x
item.description: Genres Besides being hard to tie to one country, it’s impossible to pin her to a single genre. It’s categorized as dance/electro because of Дельфины (2019), Free Love (2017), and Огонёк (2017). Also to elevate this section musically, at least.
